pages.text: Enhancer Relics can be put into the Hephaestus Forge to unlock new recipes or add bonuses. Several of these are unimplemented and have no use.
Can be found in Desert Pyramids, Jungle Temples, and Underwater Ruins. Allows you to craft Elemental Prisms.
Reduces experience usage. Can be found in Villager houses, namely the Armorer, Toolsmith and Weaponsmith.
Reduces Soul Usage. Can be found in Pillager Outposts.
Unlocks new recipes, but unused by default. Can be found in Bastion Treasure Rooms.
